org.zodiark.service.publisher

Class PublisherServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zodiark.service.publisher.PublisherServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PublisherService, Service, Session<PublisherEndpoint>

    @On(value="/publisher")
public class PublisherServiceImpl
extends Object
implements PublisherService, Session<PublisherEndpoint>
    The Publisher's application logic for validating, creating and starting a StreamingSession

      • retrieveEndpoint

        public void retrieveEndpoint(Object publisherEndpointUuid,
                    Reply reply)
        Retrieve a PublisherEndpoint based on a String. It is recommended to pass the EndpointAdapter.uuid as a key for retrieving the Endpoint. The Reply.ok(Object) will be invoked if an PublisherEndpoint \ is found, or Reply.fail(Object) if no PublisherEndpoint is associated with the key.
        Specified by:
        retrieveEndpoint in interface PublisherService
        Parameters:
        publisherEndpointUuid - The EndpointAdapter.uuid
        reply - a Reply

        Specified by:

                             org.atmosphere.cpr.AtmosphereResource r)

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • createOrJoinStreamingSession

        public void createOrJoinStreamingSession(Envelope e)
        Create or join a Streaming Session. The Session will be created if the Endpoint is a Publisher, and joined if the endpoint is a Subscriber. Implementation of this method must make sure the Wowza Server will allow the Endpoint to create or Join the session.
        Specified by:
        createOrJoinStreamingSession in interface Session<PublisherEndpoint>
        Parameters:
        e - an Envelope from the Endpoint

      • startStreamingSession

        public void startStreamingSession(Envelope e)
        Start the streaming session. This method will be called by the remote endpoint upon successful completion of Session.createSession(org.zodiark.protocol.Envelope, org.atmosphere.cpr.AtmosphereResource) and Session.createOrJoinStreamingSession(org.zodiark.protocol.Envelope)
        Specified by:
        startStreamingSession in interface Session<PublisherEndpoint>
        Parameters:
        e - an Envelope from a remote Endpoint

      • resetEndpoint

        public void resetEndpoint(Object publisherEndpointUuid,
                 Reply reply)
        When an Action is ready to be executed, send a ready message back to the client and wait for its response. The publisherEndpointUuid can be retrieved from an Envelope
        Specified by:
        resetEndpoint in interface PublisherService
        Parameters:
        publisherEndpointUuid - The EndpointAdapter.uuid
        reply - a Reply

      • createSession

        public PublisherEndpoint createSession(Envelope e,
                              org.atmosphere.cpr.AtmosphereResource resource)
        Create the PublisherEndpoint Streaming Session. The validation phase will imply calling the remote database/web service to load in memory the publisher/subscriber data. The Endpoint will be called upon success or failure of creating the session.
        Specified by:
        createSession in interface Session<PublisherEndpoint>
        Parameters:
        e - an Envelope
        resource - a AtmosphereResource
        Returns:
        An implementation of Endpoint
